channel.title: Movable-type on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in Movable-type on David Collantes

item.title: Mena wants to know
item.description: How are you using “the tool”? Mena wants to know how people are using Movable Type. That should have been the first question before last week fiasco.

item.title: In the process of moving
item.description: As you can see, I am in the process of moving from the now defunct Movable Type to the sexy WordPress. Why, you may ask? Well, because I was already planning to and because Six Apart has changed to different venues that do not interest me at all. Also, I was getting tired of the lagginess of MT. Well, it is gone, history. Welcome to a dynamic scenario once again (it all started with i42, remember Stevo and Joey?
